statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_water_usage;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, daily_usage FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE daily_usage > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM supply_chain_water_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, daily_usage FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE location LIKE '%office%' ORDER BY daily_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY daily_usage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, SUM(daily_usage) AS total_usage FROM supply_chain_water_usage GROUP BY location HAVING total_usage > 100 ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT id, location, daily_usage, timestamp FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT location, AVG(daily_usage) AS average_usage FROM supply_chain_water_usage GROUP BY location ORDER BY average_usage DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM supply_chain_water_usage WHERE daily_usage > 5000
SELECT * FROM water_usage
SELECT location, usage_amount FROM water_usage ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT AVG(usage_amount) AS average_usage FROM water_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier LIKE '%Company%'
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM supply_chain
SELECT * FROM water_usage ORDER BY usage_amount DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location FROM water_usage WHERE location='New York' AND date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT supplier, receiver, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM supply_chain GROUP BY supplier, receiver ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT id, supplier, receiver, amount, date FROM supply_chain WHERE amount > 10000 AND supplier='ABC Inc' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, usage_amount, date FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ID, Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Location = 'New York'
SELECT Name, Address FROM Supplier ORDER BY Name DESC
SELECT DeliveryID, SupplierID, Location, Quantity, Status FROM Delivery WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY DeliveryID ASC
SELECT Name, Address FROM Supplier WHERE Name LIKE '%Co%'
SELECT DeliveryID, Supplier.Name, Delivery.Location, Quantity FROM Delivery JOIN Supplier ON Delivery.SupplierID = Supplier.SupplierID
SELECT Name, Address FROM Supplier WHERE SupplierID = 1;
SELECT Location, Consumption FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY Consumption DESC;
SELECT DeliveryID, Location, Quantity FROM Delivery WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY Quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WC JOIN Delivery D ON WC.Location = D.Location;
SELECT D.DeliveryID, S.Name AS SupplierName, D.Quantity FROM Delivery D JOIN Supplier S ON D.SupplierID = S.SupplierID;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM WaterSources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WaterStorage ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT operation_type, operation_location FROM SupplyChainOperations WHERE operation_id = 3;
SELECT usage_date, usage_amount FROM WaterUsage WHERE source_id = 2 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM WaterSources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterStorage WHERE storage_capacity > 1000;
SELECT usage_date, usage_amount FROM WaterUsage WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainOperations WHERE operation_type = 'Distribution';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainLocations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM SupplyChainLocations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_capacity FROM WaterSources WHERE source_capacity > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, contract_duration FROM SupplierContracts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM SupplyChainLocations;
SELECT source_name, source_capacity FROM WaterSources WHERE source_type = 'Well';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT location_name, location_address, usage_volume FROM SupplyChainLocations JOIN WaterUsageLogs ON SupplyChainLocations.location_id = WaterUsageLogs.location_id WHERE usage_volume > 100 ORDER BY usage_volume DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, source_name, contract_date FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierContracts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierContracts.supplier_id ORDER BY contract_date;
